trans-unit.source: The 121 Platform makes CVA (Cash and Voucher Assistance) easier, safer and faster which enables humanitarian organizations to maximize their impact and provide adequate response during a disaster or conflict.
trans-unit.target: Het 121 Platform maakt CVA (Cash & Voucher Assistance) makkelijker, veiliger en sneller wat humanitaire organisaties in staat stelt hun impact to maximaliseren en adequate hulp te verlenen tijdens een ramp of conflict.
Vragen of feedback? Neem contact op

trans-unit.source: Necessary cookies are required for the basic operation of the platform.
trans-unit.target: Noodzakeljke cookies zijn nodig voor het functioneren van het platform.

trans-unit.source: Use your work email to log in.
trans-unit.target: Gebruik uw werk emailadres om in te loggen.

trans-unit.source: Invalid email or password. Double-check your credentials and try again.
trans-unit.target: Ongeldig e-mailadres of wachtwoord. Dubbel-check uw gegevens en probeer opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: They do not require explicit consent, and by using our website, you agree to their use. However, you may still manage or block these cookies via your browser settings.
trans-unit.target: Expliciete toestemming is hiervoor niet nodig. Door gebruik te maken van de website gaat u akkoort met het gebruik ervan.

trans-unit.source: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. If you wish to disable cookies, please refer to your browser's help section. Note that disabling necessary cookies may affect the website's functionality.
trans-unit.target: De meeste web browsers hebben instellingen om cookies te beheren. Als u cookies wilt blokkeren, check dan de handleiding of help-functie van uw browser. Het blokkeren van noodzakelijke cookies heeft invloed op het functioneren van de website.

trans-unit.source: If you have any questions about our use of necessary cookies, please feel free to contact us at:
trans-unit.target: Als je vragen hebt over ons gebruik van noodzakelijke cookies, neem gerust contact met ons op via:

trans-unit.source: The new password must be different from the current password.
trans-unit.target: Het nieuwe wachtwoord moet anders zijn dan het huidige wachtwoord

trans-unit.source: The new password must be at least 8 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Het nieuwe wachtwoord moet minstens 8 tekens lang zijn.

trans-unit.source: The confirm password must be equal to the new password.
You are not assigned to any project(s) yet, contact the admin/supervisor to start using the 121 portal.
trans-unit.target: U bent nog niet aan een project toegevoegd, neem contact op met een beheerder om de 121 Portal te gebruiken.

trans-unit.source: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.

trans-unit.source: You're about to remove () from your team.They will not have access to the project anymore.
trans-unit.target: You're about to remove () from your team.They will not have access to the project anymore.

trans-unit.source: There are no records that match the selected filters, clear some or all filters to continue.
trans-unit.target: There are no records that match the selected filters, clear some or all filters to continue.

trans-unit.note: The contents of the square brackets should not be touched/changed

trans-unit.source: * Leaving this field empty means the team member will have access to all PAs
trans-unit.target: * Leaving this field empty means the team member will have access to all PAs

trans-unit.source: * To use a subscope type a dot between the scope and subscope (e.g. amsterdam.west)
trans-unit.target: * To use a subscope type a dot between the scope and subscope (e.g. amsterdam.west)

trans-unit.source: Enter a valid scope. No spaces are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Enter a valid scope. No spaces are allowed.

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.

trans-unit.source: Total registrations excluding rejected and deleted registrations.
trans-unit.target: Total registrations excluding rejected and deleted registrations.

trans-unit.source: Amount of payments done in the project so far.
trans-unit.target: Amount of payments done in the project so far.

trans-unit.source: No PowerBI dashboard has been configured for this project, please contact support@121.global to set this up
trans-unit.target: No PowerBI dashboard has been configured for this project, please contact support@121.global to set this up

trans-unit.source: The base transfer value is multiplied by a set factor for each registration. For example, if the base value is $50 and the multiplier is based on household size, a 3-person household would receive $150 per payment.
trans-unit.target: The base transfer value is multiplied by a set factor for each registration. For example, if the base value is $50 and the multiplier is based on household size, a 3-person household would receive $150 per payment.

trans-unit.source: You are about to add a note to 's profile.
trans-unit.target: You are about to add a note to 's profile.

trans-unit.source: The note will be visible to other 121 users who are permitted to view personal profiles.
trans-unit.target: The note will be visible to other 121 users who are permitted to view personal profiles.

trans-unit.source: Tip: Press Command / Ctrl + Enter to submit.
trans-unit.target: Tip: Press Command / Ctrl + Enter to submit.

trans-unit.source: You're about to replace debit card number . This will block the current card and a new card will be issued. A message will be sent to the registration about this update.
trans-unit.target: You're about to replace debit card number . This will block the current card and a new card will be issued. A message will be sent to the registration about this update.

trans-unit.source: You're about to pause debit card number .
trans-unit.target: You're about to pause debit card number .

trans-unit.source: A message will be sent to the registration about this update.
trans-unit.target: A message will be sent to the registration about this update.

trans-unit.source: You're about to unpause debit card number .
trans-unit.target: You're about to unpause debit card number .

trans-unit.source: Project not found. Please check the URL and try again.
trans-unit.target: Project not found. Please check the URL and try again.

trans-unit.source: Registration not found. Please check the URL and try again.
trans-unit.target: Registration not found. Please check the URL and try again.

trans-unit.source: You're about to reset 's password. The user will receive an email with the new password sent to their registered email address. Only proceed if the user has requested this action.
trans-unit.target: You're about to reset 's password. The user will receive an email with the new password sent to their registered email address. Only proceed if the user has requested this action.

trans-unit.source: Cash distributed in the last payment.
trans-unit.target: Cash distributed in the last payment.

trans-unit.source: Select one or more registrations and try again.
trans-unit.target: Select one or more registrations and try again.

trans-unit.source: Custom messages are not automatically translated to the registration's preferred language.
trans-unit.target: Custom messages are not automatically translated to the registration's preferred language.

trans-unit.source: *Please make sure registration data is available for all used personalized fields.
trans-unit.target: *Please make sure registration data is available for all used personalized fields.

trans-unit.source: You've selected registration(s).Select a message from the template messages or write a custom message.
trans-unit.target: You've selected registration(s).Select a message from the template messages or write a custom message.

trans-unit.source: You are about to send a message to registration(s).
trans-unit.target: You are about to send a message to registration(s).

trans-unit.source: The message must be at least 20 characters long.
trans-unit.target: The message must be at least 20 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Use the 'Last Message Status' column to check the progress of messages. Closing this notification will not cancel message sending.
trans-unit.target: Use the 'Last Message Status' column to check the progress of messages. Closing this notification will not cancel message sending.

trans-unit.source: Note that if you go over 160 characters the Person affected may receive the message as multiple texts, if they have a feature-(non-smart-)phone.
trans-unit.target: Note that if you go over 160 characters the Person affected may receive the message as multiple texts, if they have a feature-(non-smart-)phone.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to send this message?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to send this message?
